pullrequest.title: Check to avoid empty debug packages reach the server

content.raw: @gerkey just want to be sure you are aware of this change, just in case of any time it fails when generating releasing packages. I have tested it locally, seems to work fine for correctly generated packages.
content.html: @gerkey just want to be sure you are aware of this change, just in case of any time it fails when generating releasing packages. I have tested it locally, seems to work fine for correctly generated packages.
